device.name: RTL8195A
device.licenseText:
ARM Limited (ARM) is supplying this software for use with Cortex-M
 processor based microcontroller, but can be equally used for other
 suitable processor architectures. This file can be freely distributed.
 Modifications to this file shall be clearly marked.
 
 THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS". NO WARRANTIES, WHETHER EXPRESS, IMPLIED
 OR STATUTORY, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF
 MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE APPLY TO THIS SOFTWARE.
 ARM SHALL NOT, IN ANY CIRCUMSTANCES, BE LIABLE FOR SPECIAL, INCIDENTAL, OR
 CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES, FOR ANY REASON WHATSOEVER.

register.name: GPIO_EXT_PORTA
register.description: GPIO IN read or OUT read back

register.name: GPIO_EXT_PORTB
register.description: GPIO IN read or OUT read back

register.name: GPIO_EXT_PORTC
register.description: GPIO IN read or OUT read back

register.name: GPIO_INT_SYNC
register.description: Is level-sensitive interrupt being sync sith PCLK

register.name: DLM
register.description: upper 8-bits of a 16-bit, Divisor Latch register RW, DLAB=1

register.name: MODEM_CTL
register.description: Controls the interface with the MODEM or data set

register.name: LINE_STATUS
register.description: Provides status information concerning the data transfer.

field.name: CARD_DETECT_SEL
field.description: 0-CD# is selected; 1-The Card Detect Test Level is selected

field.name: CAPA_BASE_CLK
field.description: This value indicates the base (maximum) clock frequency for the SD Clock. Unit values are 1MHz.

field.name: CAPA_MAX_BLOCK_LENGTH
field.description: This value indicates the maximum block size that the Host Driver can read and write to the buffer in the Host Controller.
